main event: Mrs. observed a bright white object that changed colors and seemed to pulsate near Crittenden, Kentucky on August 11, 1969.
interesting points: The object was described as too large and too close to be a star., The object changed colors to pink during the observation., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes., The observer reported the sighting on August 12, 1969, to the Aerial Phenomena Office., The conclusion of the investigation suggested the sighting could possibly be a star or planet.
sighted object: a bright white object that pulsated and changed colors
